### Where is the wedding?
The wedding will be taking place at [Our Lady of Peace](http://www.summitcatholic.org/our-lady-of-peace-silverthorne/) in Silverthorne, CO.

### When is the wedding?
The wedding is Saturday January 7th, 2017. The ceremony begins at 2pm, please plan on arriving a half hour early. It takes about an hour to get to Silverthorne from Denver but check [CDOT](http://www.cotrip.org/highways.htm#?commuteRouteId=54) for traffic and weather.

### A Catholic wedding?

A Catholic wedding is about an hour and a half long, and includes a mass.
